title: Marriage for moderns: In time of trouble
creator_credit: Affiliated Film Producers and Willard Van Dyke
brief_description: Dramatizes the experiences of a couple whose happy marriage is jeopardized by a selfish lack of understanding of the partnership aspects of married life. When Mrs Denkman comes for counsel to Dr Burns, the clergyman who married her, she takes a wise step. Dr Burns is able to advise her on remedial measures for her marriage, which is declining because of problems revealed in her husband’s heavy drinking.
